message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $180 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $90 is too low for me.  How about we split the difference a little closer to my original price? Would $150 work for you?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $150 is still a bit out of my budget. How about we try to get closer to my original offer of $90? Can you meet me at $135?
